name: Jemeyah '22
description: - JEMEYAH -  a cute robot detected negative energy on the island of Veras. Jemeyah goes to the island and starts investigating. Jemeyah found out that the bad Slime Spreading all over the areas. Clear the 10 Areas of the island, and Defeat all the Evil Bosses on your way. Collect powerups item that gives Jemeyah an  upgrade to his weapon. Shoot all enemies in a 2D Platform Action Adventure Game.
